content.content: Weekly MIPs Update #36   966×606 36.6 KB   Last Week | May 10 - 14  Monday  Inclusion Polls for the Formally Submitted proposals were live on Monday and ended on Thursday at 4 pm UTC. Six proposals and subproposals passed the Inclusion Polls and will move on to the Bundled Governance Poll, these include:   MIPs  MIP50: Direct Deposit Module MIP51: Monthly Governance Cycle    Amendments  MIP4c2-SP14: MIP0 Amendments    Sustainable Ecosystem Scaling Core Unit Onboarding  MIP39c2-SP10: Sustainable Ecosystem Scaling Core Unit Mandate, SES-001 MIP40c3-SP10: Core Unit Budget, SES-001 MIP41c4-SP10: Facilitator Onboarding, SES-001       Thursday  The Inclusion Poll Review happened on Thursday’s governance call. Four proposals failed the Inclusion Poll stage, these are:   MIPs  MIP49: Staking Rewards    Strategic MarComms Core Unit Onboarding  MIP39c2-SP9: Strategic Marcomms Core Unit Mandate, CPM-001 MIP40c3-SP9: Core Unit Budget, CPM-001 MIP41c4-SP9: Facilitator Onboarding, CPM-001       This Week | May 17 - 21  Monday   The Bundled MIPs Governance Poll went live on Monday 4pm UTC and will end Thursday at 4pm UTC.   Thursday  The Governance Facilitator, @LongForWisdom, will perform a Governance Poll Review during the weekly Governance Call. This reviews the outcome of the MIPs Governance Poll and will confirm which MIPs and Subproposals will be included in the final bundled Executive Vote.   Next Week | May 24 - 28  Monday  This will be the beginning of week 4, the final week of the May governance cycle. The Monthly MIPs Executive Vote will go live on Monday, May 24th. The vote will be active for four days; if the Executive Vote does not pass before the four-day limit expires, all of the vote’s bundled proposals will be rejected.   Thursday  The Governance Facilitator, @LongForWisdom, will perform the Governance Cycle Review during the weekly Governance Call.   MIP Statuses Visit the MIPs Portal for a more detailed view of MIP statuses  Proposals in the Request for Comments Stage  MIPs  MIP26: DssGov - Governance Contract Redesign MIP31: Active Reserve Via AMM MIP32: Peg Stability Module - Compound Mixed Exposure MIP33: Maker Stability Price Module MIP35: Peg Stability Module - Compound Mixed Exposure - With Farming MIP36: Peg Stability - Compound Governance Dai Leverage MIP37: Static Reserve For Governance MIP42: Proposed Compensation Addendum for MakerDAO Contributors MIP52: Dispute Resolution MIP53: The MKR Compensation Guidelines MIP54: DssVest   Subproposals  Core Unit Onboarding  Collateral Onboarding  MIP39c2-SP12: Adding Collateral Onboarding Core Unit MIP40c3-SP16: Modify Collateral Onboarding Core Unit Budget MIP41c4-SP14: Facilitator Onboarding, Collateral Onboarding Core Unit   Governance Communications  MIP39c2-SP8: Governance Communications Core Unit, COM-001 MIP40c3-SP8: Modify Core Unit Budget, COM-001 MIP41c4-SP8: Facilitator Onboarding, COM-001   Strategic Happiness  MIP39c2-SP11: Strategic Happiness Core Unit MIP40c3-SP16: The Strategic Happiness Core Unit Budget, SH-001 MIP41c4-SP11: Shitpost Facilitator Onboarding, Strategic Happiness Core Unit, SH-001     Declarations of Intent  MIP13c3-SP9: Onboarding a new collateral type backed by B.Protocol (Declaration of Intent)   Amendments  MIP4c2-SP11: MIP24 Amendments     Pre-MIP Discussions  Proposal Ideas on the Forum MakerDAO Treasury of Tokens Originated Outside Maker Protocol Fixed Payment Schedule, Lump Sum Vaults on Existing Collateral Types Pre-MIP discussion: The MKR Compensation Guidelines   /fin
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
